General.Name: DAVIDsTEA Inc
General.Description: DAVIDsTEA Inc. operates as a tea retailer in Canada and the United States. It offers loose-leaf teas, pre-packaged teas, tea sachets, and tea-related gifts; tea accessories, including tea and travel mugs, teacup sets, teapots, tea makers, kettles, infusers, filters, frothers, tins, and spoons; and food and beverages. The company also provides its products through e-commerce platform, davidstea.com, as well as the Amazon marketplace, its wholesale customers which includes grocery stores and pharmacies, and company owned storefronts. DAVIDsTEA Inc. was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Mount Royal, Canada.
General.Address: 5430 Ferrier Street, Mount Royal, QC, Canada, H4P 1M2
